text:
care
Information
An important part of antenatal care 
is getting information that will help 
you to make informed choices about 
your pregnancy. Your midwife or 
doctor should give you information 
in writing or some other form that 
you can easily use and understand. 
Your midwife or doctor should 
provide you with information in 
an appropriate format if you:
•   have a physical, learning  
   or sensory disability;
•   do not speak or read 
    English.
You may have lots of 
things you want
